hr.irb.fastRandomForest

Class DataCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.irb.fastRandomForest.DataCache

  • public class DataCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a dataset that in FastRandomTrees use for training. The data points are stored in a single-precision array indexed by attribute first, and then by instance, to make access by FastRandomTrees faster. Also stores the sorted order of the instances by any attribute, can create bootstrap samples, and seed a random number generator from the stored data.
    Author:
    Fran Supek (fran.supek[AT]irb.hr)

      • resample

        public DataCache resample(int bagSize,
                          java.util.Random random)
        Uses sampling with replacement to create a new DataCache from an existing one. The probability of sampling a specific instance does not depend on its weight. When an instance is sampled multiple times, its weight in the new DataCache increases to a multiple of the original weight.
        Parameters:
        bagSize - If this is equal to the DataCache.numInstances, makes a a bootstrap sample (n of of in
        random - A random number generator.
        Returns:
        a new DataCache - consult "DataCache(DataCache origData)" constructor to see what's deep / shallow copied

      • getRandomNumberGenerator

        public java.util.Random getRandomNumberGenerator(long seed)
        Returns a random number generator. The initial seed of the random number generator depends on the given seed and the contents of the sortedIndices array (a single attribute is picked, a hashcode of its sortedIndices is computed).
        Parameters:
        seed - the given seed
        Returns:
        the random number generator
